article_title: Five major challenges facing Matt Bevin after Inauguration Day
article_text:
Bevin claims he faces financial mess, but Beshear touts surplus for state

Public pensions and health care present financial headaches for Bevin

Bevin must find way to work with House Speaker Greg Stumbo and new Attorney General Andy Beshear

article_metadata.title: Five major challenges facing Matt Bevin after Inauguration Day | Lexington Herald-Leader

og.description: After a day of celebration Tuesday on becoming Kentucky’s 62nd governor, Republican Matt Bevin faces the stark reality of governing a challenged state.
